column1: Smoque BBQ////I ordered a half slab of St Louis Ribs and a side of sliced brisket.   Both were excellent.   Tender
column3: very very good.    The brisket was so tender
column4: it just melted in my mouth.    Six pieces of ribs
column7: mac and cheese and slaw was a lot of food....Maybe next time
column8: I can split with a friend and get only 3 ribs
column9: the brisket and share a side dish.
